name: Falling Pixels
description:
Falling Pixels is an entry into the 127 Weekly Game Jam. The idea is to fix the falling pixels with the correct colors before they get past you. You cycle through you primary colors. Be careful, you only have 3 lives to use to make it till the end and some pixels require more than one color!

CONTROLS

D, A to cycle through the three colors

R to restart game

Q to quit
